umkmwonorejo.title: Website UMKM Wonorejo
umkmwonorejo.subtitle: Digital Platform to Empower Local MSMEs
umkmwonorejo.desc1: The Wonorejo MSME website is a digital platform designed to help micro, small, and medium enterprises in the Wonorejo area market their products online. This project aims to increase the visibility and accessibility of local MSMEs to a wider market.
umkmwonorejo.desc2: With a user-friendly interface and modern features, this website makes it easy for customers to explore a wide range of MSME products, from traditional foods and handicrafts to other high-quality local products. The platform also features a well-organized product catalog system.
umkmwonorejo.desc3: This project was developed using the latest web technology to ensure optimal performance, responsiveness across various devices, and an enjoyable user experience. Through this digitalization, it is hoped that Wonorejo MSMEs can grow and compete in the digital era.
umkmwonorejo.feature1desc: Attractive and organized display of MSME products
umkmwonorejo.feature4desc: Optimal loading time for the best experience

godive.title: Godive
godive.subtitle: Indonesian Diving Spot Recommendation App
godive.desc1: GoDive is a diving spot recommendation app in Indonesia designed to help beginners to professional divers find the best diving spots with complete and accurate information. The app is designed to provide a safer and more planned diving experience through location recommendation systems that consider weather conditions, diving difficulty levels, and marine safety factors.
godive.desc2: With an intuitive interface, GoDive provides real-time weather information at each dive site, allowing users to check wind conditions, waves, and underwater visibility before starting their diving activities. In addition, this app is equipped with a unique feature that detects diving equipment. Users simply take a photo of their equipment to ensure that it is complete and suitable before diving.
godive.desc3: GoDive also offers a photo-based marine species identification feature to help divers recognize whether the species they encounter are dangerous or not. All of these features are developed using modern web and AI technology to provide a safe, informative, and responsive experience across multiple devices. With GoDive, it is hoped that diving activities in Indonesia will become safer, more enjoyable, and accessible to more people.
godive.feature1desc: Location recommendation systems that consider weather conditions, diving difficulty levels, and marine safety factors
godive.feature2desc: Real-time weather information at each dive site
godive.feature3desc: Unique feature that detects diving equipment

justibot.title: Justibot
justibot.subtitle: AI-Powered Indonesian Legal Consultation Service Website
justibot.desc1: JustiBot is a digital platform designed to help Indonesians access legal consultation services more easily and affordably. This project aims to provide fast and reliable solutions through its legal education chatbot feature, directory of professional lawyers, and various ready-to-use legal documents. With this platform, JustiBot supports efforts to improve legal literacy while making it easier for users to find legal services that suit their needs.
justibot.desc2: With a user-friendly interface and modern features, this website makes it easy for users to explore various legal needs, from reading the latest legal articles, searching for lawyers by specialty, to downloading legal document templates such as agreements or powers of attorney. All information is organized so that users can navigate quickly and efficiently without any special technical experience.
justibot.desc3: This project was developed using the latest web technology to ensure optimal performance, fast access, and a responsive display on various devices. Integration with an AI chatbot also provides an interactive experience that helps users understand legal issues in a simple way. Through the digitization of legal services, it is hoped that JustiBot can become a trusted solution for the public in improving their understanding of the law and obtaining legal services effectively in the digital age.
justibot.feature1desc: Interactive chatbot that helps users understand legal issues in a simple way
justibot.feature2desc: Directory of professional lawyers that can be accessed easily
justibot.feature3desc: Various ready-to-use legal documents that can be downloaded easily
justibot.feature4desc: Latest legal articles that can be accessed easily

antarkita.title: Antarkita
antarkita.subtitle: Recipe Application
antarkita.desc1: Antarkita is a digital platform designed to help micro, small, and medium enterprises in the Wonorejo area market their products online. This project aims to increase the visibility and accessibility of local MSMEs to a wider market.
antarkita.desc2: This application is designed to have several key features such as a list of favorite recipes, recipe description pages that provide step-by-step explanations, and notifications when there are new recipes that match the user's preferences. All of these features are designed in the form of a UI/UX prototype that illustrates the complete usage flow, from recipe selection to saving it to the favorites list.
antarkita.desc3: In addition, Antarkita also incorporates the concept of Generative AI to automatically provide recipe recommendations based on the ingredients users have or their cooking habits. Although this project does not yet include backend implementation or AI functionality, the UI/UX design provides a clear picture of how these features will function and interact with each other in the complete application.
antarkita.feature1desc: Interactive chatbot to help users understand recipes
antarkita.feature2desc: Recipe description page that provides step-by-step explanations
antarkita.feature3desc: Notification when there are new recipes that match the user's preferences
antarkita.feature4desc: Recipe recommendation based on the ingredients users have or their cooking habits
